titleStmt.title: The Englishmans docter. Or, The schoole of Salerne Or, physicall obseruations for the perfect preseruing of the body of man in continuall health.
Regimen sanitatis Salernitatum. English
titleStmt.author: Joannes, de Mediolano.
Harington, John, Sir, 1560-1612.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by William Jaggard] for Iohn Helme, and Iohn Busby Iunior, and are to be sold at the little shoppe next Cliffords Inne gate, in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: A translation by Sir John Harington of: Regimen sanitatis Salernitatum.
Running title reads: The Salerne schoole.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the little shoppe next Cliffords Inne gate, in Fleet-street
